timeline.bodyText: Do you not need a precheck for checkStatus before invoking api or checkHandle is enough ?
timeline.author: medhavidhawan

replies.bodyText: The checkHandle and checkStatus  verifies the validity of the call.
replies.author: Maithem

timeline.bodyText: Please add note on what it checks on rocksdb
timeline.author: medhavidhawan

timeline.bodyText: nit:This code is repeated in every method.
timeline.author: medhavidhawan

timeline.bodyText: Could you please add comments as to reason why try with resources is necessary here.
timeline.author: medhavidhawan

timeline.message:
Explicitly Close Map Streams

Although RocksDB iterators get closed automatically by finalize,
they should be closed right after they are no longer needed and
not relay on the Java's GC to release those resources.
